name: Fix Your Mess
description:
Find detached instances all over your document.

Fix Your Mess scans your Figma designs and helps you tidy up your work. You can scan all pages of the current Figma document, find all detached instances and decide what to do with them.

And more features soon.

Weâ€™re just starting, but your feedback will help us prioritize our plans. If you have any suggestions or feedback, please drop us a line.
